name: Anonymously Reporting Tool
scroll_down: Scroll down to learn how it works
slider_description: This tool allows the employees to send feedback anonymously to their company.

HOW_DOES_IT_WORK.TITLE: How does it work?
HOW_DOES_IT_WORK.DESC: Have you experienced something bad at your company and want to share this problem with your managers? You can report report harassment/bias, send feedback, or ask questions to your company while not sharing any personal data (e.g., name, surname, e-mail, phone number). The app will automatically create a passcode that makes you available to log in anonymously into the app to follow the case's further updates, such as messages or company answers.

HOW_ANON_IT_IS.TITLE: How Anonymous it is?
HOW_ANON_IT_IS.DESC: The app doesn't require you to share any personal data (e.g., name, surname, e-mail, phone number) to report an issue. Alternatively, it generates a unique passcode before completing the case report and shows it to the user. The passcode must not be forgotten as it will be needed to login into the app to be able for the user to follow their case's further updates.

approved_email: The email successfully approved. Now, your employees can see your company's name on the company list.
